messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'getQuote'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [fiatAmount, cryptoAmount, action, fiatCurrency, cryptoCurrency, getQuote]

import { useState } from 'react'; import DashboardHeader from '../components/DashboardHeader'; import { AreaChart, Area, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; import { TrendingUp, ArrowUpRight, ArrowDownRight, Briefcase, PieChart as PieChartIcon } from 'lucide-react'; const performanceData = [ { name: '1', value: 21000 }, { name: '5', value: 22500 }, { name: '10', value: 21800 }, { name: '15', value: 23400 }, { name: '20', value: 24100 }, { name: '25', value: 23800 }, { name: '30', value: 24562 }, ]; const allocationData = [ { name: 'Bitcoin', value: 12500, color: '#F7931A' }, { name: 'Ethereum', value: 8000, color: '#627EEA' }, { name: 'Solana', value: 2500, color: '#00FFA3' }, { name: 'Ripple', value: 1000, color: '#23292F' }, { name: 'Others', value: 562, color: '#6639E4' }, ]; const portfolioAssets = [ { id: 1, name: 'Bitcoin', symbol: 'BTC', balance: 0.182, price: 68681.31, value: 12500, change: 2.4, color: '#F7931A' }, { id: 2, name: 'Ethereum', symbol: 'ETH', balance: 4.024, price: 1988.07, value: 8000, change: -1.2, color: '#627EEA' }, { id: 3, name: 'Solana', symbol: 'SOL', balance: 28.9, price: 86.50, value: 2500, change: 12.4, color: '#00FFA3' }, { id: 4, name: 'Ripple', symbol: 'XRP', balance: 694.4, price: 1.44, value: 1000, change: 0.5, color: '#23292F' }, ]; export default function Portfolio() { const [timeframe, setTimeframe] = useState('1M'); // Custom Tooltip for the Performance Chart const CustomTooltip = ({ active, payload, label }: any) => { if (active && payload && payload.length) { return (

); } return null; }; // Custom Tooltip for the Pie Chart const PieTooltip = ({ active, payload }: any) => { if (active && payload && payload.length) { return (

{payload[0].name}

${payload[0].value.toLocaleString()}

); } return null; }; return (

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'fetchProfile'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.
